sentence.Network_en: The center of inscribed circle of tetrahedron is called incenter.
sentence.Network_cn: 四面体内切球的球心称为四面体的内心。

sentence.Network_en: We can now use tetrahedron and hexahedron elements in three - dimensional stress analysis.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们现在在三维应力分析中采用四面体单元和六面体单元.

sentence.Network_en: Each tetrahedron shares two of its oxygens with neighboring tetrahedra.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个四面体都有两个氧原子是与其相邻的两个四面体共用的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from late Greek tetraedron, neuter (used as a noun) of tetraedros 'four-sided'

means.word_mean: 1. any polyhedron having four plane faces

auth_sentence.content: With his patented Tetrahedron design he helped to transform the retail sector in his native Sweden and, in time, Europe.
